frontMatter.title: Print Pattern 3
frontMatter.description: Write a programme to print the given pattern

contentHtml:
Write a python programme to print the given pattern

Input  : 5
Output :

x x x x x
x       x
x       x
x       x
x x x x x
markdown:
## Write a python programme to print the given pattern

```txt
Input  : 5
Output :

x x x x x
x       x
x       x
x       x
x x x x x
```
